trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_delegate" name="delegate" href=""></xref> used by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator"></xref> class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_delegate" name="delegate" href=""> </xref>供<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator"></xref>類別來傳遞屬性、 文字及泛空白字元的值為 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別與 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 類型的屬性、 文字或泛空白字元相容。

trans-unit.source: An XmlValueGetter`delegate` is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a `string` and then reparsing it again for validation.
trans-unit.target: XmlValueGetter`delegate`屬性、 文字或泛空白字元節點的 CLR 值已經可用，並且可避免將其轉換成的成本就很有用`string`，然後重新剖析進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic, or the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class reference documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別，請參閱[XmlSchemaValidator 推入型驗證](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)主題，或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>類別參考文件。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator>
